title: Writing Command-Line Tools using IronPython and Visual Studios
summary:
Learn how cool it is to write command-line tools using IronPython and
Visual Studios. In this talk we cover why command-lines tools are
important for .NET shops, how to write one, and finally, how to
distribute it as a standalone .exe.
